name: agnosticui
author: Rob Levin
description: An agnostic UI component library prioritizing clean HTML and CSS, but built to agnostically work with many popular JavaScript frameworks like React, Vue, and Svelte.

scripts.sync:react: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-react run syncStyles
scripts.sync:vue: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-vue run syncStyles
scripts.sync:svelte: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-svelte run syncStyles
scripts.sync: yarn sync:react && yarn sync:vue && yarn sync:svelte
scripts.test: yarn sync:react && yarn test:react && yarn sync:vue && yarn test:vue && yarn sync:svelte && yarn test:svelte
scripts.start:css: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-css run start
scripts.start:react: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-react run storybook
scripts.start:vue: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-vue run storybook
scripts.start:svelte: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnosticui-svelte run storybook
scripts.start:showcase: yarn build:css && yarn workspace showcase run serve
